title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: download, build and run large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (npm: ollama).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama API (PyPI: ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) to use Ollama models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Self-hosted web UI for Ollama (Docker-ready) with chat, model management, multi-user and RAG plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama (Maven Central: ollama4j).

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem (ollama-rb) providing idiomatic access to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI for pulling, listing and chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilots.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration (PyPI: ollama-haystack) to use Ollama models in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client (NuGet: OllamaSharp) for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG demo using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex for local document Q&A.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and autoscaling support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a reproducible dev service in CI pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate (ollama-rs) providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-node
summary: Node.js wrapper (npm: ollama-node) with RxJS streams and TypeScript decorators.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted writing using Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-model-zoo
summary: Community-curated collection of ready-to-use Modelfiles for niche domains (code, medical, RPG).

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that integrates Ollama completions into channels with per-model ACLs.
